# Changelog

## Version 1.0.0 (2025-03-20)

Initial release with the following features:

* Multi-layer caching (memory, Redis, disk)
* Flexible configuration system
* Pluggable eviction policies (LRU, LFU, FIFO)
* Advanced compression options
* Resilience mechanisms for handling failures
* Namespacing support
* Security features (encryption, access control)
* Telemetry and monitoring
* Cache warmup strategies
* Adaptive TTL based on access patterns
* Distributed cache features
* Comprehensive test suite
